001package com.commercetools.graphql.api.types;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonSubTypes;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonTypeInfo;
005import java.util.List;
006
007/**
008 * A field to retrieve available shipping methods for a cart.
009 */
010@JsonTypeInfo(
011    use = JsonTypeInfo.Id.NAME,
012    include = JsonTypeInfo.As.PROPERTY,
013    property = "__typename"
014)
015@JsonSubTypes(@JsonSubTypes.Type(value = InStore.class, name = "InStore"))
016public interface ShippingMethodsByCartInterface {
017  List<ShippingMethod> getShippingMethodsByCart();
018
019  void setShippingMethodsByCart(List<ShippingMethod> shippingMethodsByCart);
020}
